title: `rustup update` on macOS (Mojave) fails for `rustfmt`
body:
The invoked command along with the error message are as follows:

```
$ rustup update
info: syncing channel updates for 'stable-x86_64-apple-darwin'
info: latest update on 2018-12-06, rust version 1.31.0 (abe02cefd 2018-12-04)
info: downloading component 'rustc'
 62.6 MiB /  62.6 MiB (100 %)   7.9 MiB/s ETA:   0 s
info: downloading component 'rust-std'
 49.0 MiB /  49.0 MiB (100 %)   8.8 MiB/s ETA:   0 s
info: downloading component 'cargo'
info: downloading component 'rust-docs'
  8.5 MiB /   8.5 MiB (100 %)   7.7 MiB/s ETA:   0 s
info: downloading component 'clippy-preview'
info: downloading component 'rustfmt-preview'
info: removing component 'rustc'
info: removing component 'rust-std'
info: removing component 'cargo'
info: removing component 'rust-docs'
info: removing component 'clippy-preview'
info: removing component 'rustfmt-preview'
info: installing component 'rustc'
info: installing component 'rust-std'
info: installing component 'cargo'
info: installing component 'rust-docs'
info: installing component 'clippy-preview'
info: installing component 'rustfmt-preview'
info: syncing channel updates for 'beta-x86_64-apple-darwin'
info: latest update on 2018-12-09, rust version 1.32.0-beta.2 (a01e4761a 2018-12-08)
info: downloading component 'rustc'
 64.4 MiB /  64.4 MiB (100 %)   9.0 MiB/s ETA:   0 s
info: downloading component 'rust-std'
 49.1 MiB /  49.1 MiB (100 %)   8.0 MiB/s ETA:   0 s
info: downloading component 'cargo'
  3.4 MiB /   3.4 MiB (100 %) 462.9 KiB/s ETA:   0 s
info: downloading component 'rust-docs'
  8.5 MiB /   8.5 MiB (100 %)   2.9 MiB/s ETA:   0 s
info: removing component 'rustc'
info: removing component 'rust-std'
info: removing component 'cargo'
info: removing component 'rust-docs'
info: installing component 'rustc'
info: installing component 'rust-std'
info: installing component 'cargo'
info: installing component 'rust-docs'
info: syncing channel updates for 'nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin'
info: latest update on 2018-12-08, rust version 1.32.0-nightly (4a45578bc 2018-12-07)
error: component 'rustfmt-preview' for 'x86_64-apple-darwin' is unavailable for download
info: checking for self-updates
info: downloading self-update

         stable-x86_64-apple-darwin updated - rustc 1.31.0 (abe02cefd 2018-12-04)
           beta-x86_64-apple-darwin updated - rustc 1.32.0-beta.2 (a01e4761a 2018-12-08)
  nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin update failed - rustc 1.32.0-nightly (6e9b84296 2018-11-10)
```

Specifically, 

```
error: component 'rustfmt-preview' for 'x86_64-apple-darwin' is unavailable for download
```
